title: Dualspell

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to split their life energy into two, allowing them to die once and keep functioning as a living player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Split players cannot be given protection. Protective visits will still go through, but their ability will fail and they will be notified that the player has been split.
- When split players die the first time, their faction will be revealed, based on what faction theyâ€™d show up as if they were dead .
- After split players die once, they may act twice at night, but have Vulnerable defence.
- You may target yourself.

*Immortality is impossible. But, with a little work, you can improve on having just one life.*
